thread.title: Man tragically choked to death after attempting to eat four pickled eggs in one minute for £5 bet
thread.title_full: Man tragically choked to death after attempting to eat four pickled eggs in one minute for £5 bet

author: Katie French
title: Man tragically choked to death after attempting to eat four pickled eggs in one minute for £5 bet
text:
News Man tragically choked to death after attempting to eat four pickled eggs in one minute for £5 bet The retired builder refused to spit out the pickled eggs, leaving them to turn to cement inside him Share David Mitchell aka Greengrass (Photo: Express & Echo) Share Get daily   Thank you for subscribing! Could   
A retired builder choked to death after attempting a bet to eat four pickled eggs in 60 seconds for £5. 
David Mitchell collapsed after refusing to spit the eggs out when he lost the challenge, and they started to turn into 'cement' inside him. 
The landlord of the pub and locals fought desperately to clear his airways but the 66-year-old suffocated and died. 
The egg matter had turned to 'cement' inside Mr Mitchell and blocked his airways - causing him to choke, an inquest heard. Read More Katie Rough's devastated family arrive for court hearing of girl, 15, accused of murdering seven-year-old found injured in field 
When police picked up Mr Mitchell's wife she asked them "It's pickled eggs isn't it ? It's just the sort of thing he would do." 
The inquest heard that Mr Mitchell was having his usual Saturday lunchtime pint in the White Hart Inn, Okehampton, Devon, when three builders aged in their 20s came in. 
The men - who have not been identified - got chatting with Mr Mitchell and suggested he take on the pickled egg challenge, the Express and Echo reported . 
If he ate four in a minute they said he would win £5 and they would buy the eggs. If he failed Mr Mitchell, who was also known as Greengrass, would pay the egg costs and settle the bet. 
In a statement barman Barry Wiggins said Mr Mitchell seemed to jump at the chance. 
He put two eggs either side of his mouth with a third in the centre. Mr Mitchell died after taking up the pickled eggs challenge (Photo: Getty) 
Soon afterwards he pushed in a fourth but then acknowledged he had lost and paid off the builders, who left, the inquest heard. 
"Greengrass was still chewing on the eggs," said Mr Wiggins. 
"I asked if he wanted to spit them out but he said no. 
"I noticed his eyes were almost closed and wet and his lips were blue. He then collapsed on the bar." Read More Raging bull turns tables on female dwarf bullfighter by knocking her to floor and JUMPING on her White Hart Inn, Bridestow, where the tragic incident unfolded (Photo: Google Maps) 
Mr Wiggins dialled 999 while other locals rushed to help. Landlord Mike Dennis grabbed the village defibrillator and tried to resuscitate him. But all efforts failed. 
"We looked into his mouth - it was totally clogged with egg' said Mr Dennis. "It was like cement." 
He described Mr Mitchell as "always jolly, always up for a bit of fun" and "certainly one of life's characters." 
The court heard that police drove Mr Mitchell's wife Carol to the pub after the incident, which took place in September last year. 
She told them: "It was pickled eggs wasn't it? It's just the sort of thing he would do." Read More Patient found hanged in hospital ward toilet cubicle 'was accidentally strangled by their drip feed cord' 
Devon assistant coroner, John Tomalin, last night warned anyone tempted to try a similar contest to "think very carefully before doing so." 
Recording a verdict of accidental death, he said Mr Mitchell had pursued "the folly of taking on this pickled egg challenge." 
After the hearing his widow Carol, 69, added: "He liked pickled eggs but I've never heard of him doing something like this. Trouble is, he liked a dare. 
"I just hope others learn from his mistake and don't attempt such a dangerous challenge." 
In 2014, former Royal Marine, Gary Sims, 55, died after chocking on three pickled eggs, in a pub challenge. 
And on June 8, 2015, 14-year-old Anna Sexton died after gorging on pickled eggs in a late night binge. Like us on Facebook
